Welcome to Applied Bayesian Analysis for Summer 2025! 

Each class meeting will be split between lecture and practice. Attending live is not necessary (with the exception of 07/31), but it is your responsibility to keep up with the assigned work.

**The final exam will be available on Canvas on Tuesday, August 5, 2025.**

This project was supported by the 2023 [BATS program](https://www.stat.uci.edu/bayes-bats/), funded by NSF IUSE: EHR program with award numbers 2215879, 2215920, and 2215709.
